artist: Artist: Edward Ruscha; Artist: Billy Al Bengston; Author: Billy Al Bengston; Photographer: Larry Bell; Photographer: Ken Price; Publisher: Edward Ruscha and Billy Al Bengston; Printer: Vaughan Printing, Santa Monica, Calif.
catalogue_raissonne: Foster 7; Engberg B7; The Open Book p. 198f
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
description: Softcover book with faux wood-grain commercial paper stock cover; black and white photograph collaged to front cover with black paper mounting corners; 21 photographic illustrations and one reproduction of a photograph staped to paper; 32 pp.; Latigo (leather cord) binding. Text in manuscript facsimile, with date-stamps. This copy: First (and only) edition.
markings: Distributor\'s name and address printed on paper sticker adhered to title page. MIA ex-library markings on exterior and interior.
provenance: Transferred to permanent collection from MIA Library.
signed: Signed by the artists on the front cover, in black ink : B.A.B.; and in blue ink: Ed Ruscha
title: Business Cards
